definition: male/Baron, lowest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/CL:個|个[ge4]
very masculine guy/a real man/(used ironically) a grown man

pinyin: nan2 ren2 bu4 huai4 , nu:3 ren2 bu4 ai4

definition: lit. the man has gold under his knees; fig. a man who does not easily kneel in front of others (owing to pride or moral integrity)
pinyin: nan2 ren2 xi1 xia4 you3 huang2 jin1

sentences.english: There aring a lot of secrets in the man heart can't say literally that let wife listen to.
sentences.chinese: 男人心中有好多祕密不能隨便說給妻子聽。

sentences.english: When a young man reached 18 or 20 years old, the capping ceremony would be held.
sentences.chinese: 一個年輕的男人十八歲或二十歲時，要舉行冠禮。

sentences.english: He is a handsome man with devilish charm.
sentences.chinese: 他是一個英俊瀟灑有着魔鬼般魅力的男人。

sentences.english: It is research that is guaranteed to delight men - and infuriate the women in their lives.
sentences.chinese: 這項研究結果一定會讓男人高興，惹女人生氣。

sentences.english: She carries herself very nicely and attracts all the men.
sentences.chinese: 她體態美好，吸引着所有的男人。

sentences.english: And rarely should a man cry in pain.
sentences.chinese: 而且男人很少該在痛苦中哭泣。

sentences.english: Greek men were said to be a bit too soppy .
sentences.chinese: 希臘男人被認爲有點“過於纏綿”。

sentences.english: She had too little faith in mankind not to know that they were erring .
sentences.chinese: 她對男人們沒有信心，知道他們總要犯錯誤的。

sentences.english: Men, as a rule of thumb, should always keep their nails clipped.
sentences.chinese: 男人一般來說都應該保持指甲處於修剪過的狀態。

sentences.english: Wat is de functie van deze man?
sentences.chinese: 這個男人從事是什麼職位？

sentences.english: Tingtzu loincloths are traditional garb for Yami males on Orchid Island.
sentences.chinese: 丁字褲是蘭嶼雅美男人的傳統服裝。

sentences.english: The man spent every afternoon on her six-meter wide garden.
sentences.chinese: 這個男人每天下午都在她的花園裏。

sentences.english: After all, this is male chauvinism at play in.
sentences.chinese: 說到底，這也是大男人主義在作怪了。

sentences.english: The first man's neighbours were unhelpful.
sentences.chinese: 第一個男人的鄰居不樂於助人。

sentences.english: ONE highly-skilled legal professional and one man in a very expensive suit.
sentences.chinese: 一個高級法律顧問和一個穿着非常昂貴的西裝的男人。
